#text=Today , I decided I really needed to get a haircut , so I went by Lou ' s. Lou has been my barber since I first had hair , and my father went there before that .
#text=When you enter his place , he immediately says ' ?
#text=He sits you in his adjustable barber ' s chair , and gets just the right height while facing you toward his wall size mirror .
#text=He pulls out his comb and pulls it through your hair as you both talk about the length the hair needs to be , and whether you need a shave also .
#text=He turns you away from the mirror and starts clipping away , the whole time talking with you about the weather and sports .
#text=He asks about your family , and whether the fish are biting down at the local lake .
#text=In what seems just like seconds , Lou takes one last clip and spins you back to the mirror to show you his creation on your head .
#text=When you are satisfied , you pay him plus a little extra for the sheer perfection of this haircut , and tell him you will see him next month .
